AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: Constituent Address Picklist
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: Demo of a form that lets you pick from a list of available items and slide over to a list of selected items.
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: Styons Software

LoadImplementation.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
CREATE PROCEDURE USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_ADD_PICKLIST_PRELOAD ( @CONSTITUENTID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ,@AVAILABLEADDRESSES XML = NULL OUTPUT ,@SELECTEDADDRESSES XML = NULL OUTPUT ) AS BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON --Available addresses == all addresses on the constituent record except those which have been selected SET @AVAILABLEADDRESSES = ( SELECT A.ID AS ADDRESSID ,A.ADDRESSBLOCK AS ADDRESSBLOCK FROM [ADDRESS] A LEFT JOIN USR_SELECTEDADDRESSES SA ON SA.ADDRESSID = A.ID WHERE A.CONSTITUENTID = @CONSTITUENTID AND SA.ID IS NULL FOR XML RAW('ITEM'),TYPE,ELEMENTS,ROOT('AVAILABLEADDRESSES'),BINARY BASE64 )
--Selected addresses == all addresses that have been recorded in the USR_SELECTEDADDRESSES table SET @SELECTEDADDRESSES = ( SELECT A.ID AS ADDRESSID ,A.ADDRESSBLOCK AS ADDRESSBLOCK FROM [ADDRESS] A JOIN USR_SELECTEDADDRESSES SA ON SA.ADDRESSID = A.ID WHERE A.CONSTITUENTID = @CONSTITUENTID FOR XML RAW('ITEM'),TYPE,ELEMENTS,ROOT('AVAILABLEADDRESSES'),BINARY BASE64 ) RETURN 0 END

SaveImplementation.c:CreateProcedureSQL: CREATE PROCEDURE USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_ADD_PICKLIST ( @ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER = NULL OUTPUT ,@CONSTITUENTID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ,@CHANGEAGENTID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER = NULL ,@AVAILABLEADDRESSES XML = NULL ,@SELECTEDADDRESSES XML = NULL ) AS BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON SET @ID = ISNULL(@ID,NEWID()) DECLARE @NOW DATETIME = GETDATE() IF @CHANGEAGENTID IS NULL EXEC USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID OUTPUT BEGIN TRY DELETE USR_SELECTEDADDRESSES WHERE CONSTITUENTID = @CONSTITUENTID INSERT INTO USR_SELECTEDADDRESSES (ID, CONSTITUENTID, ADDRESSID, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED) SELECT NEWID() ,@CONSTITUENTID ,T.c.value('(ADDRESSID)[1]','uniqueidentifier') ,@CHANGEAGENTID ,@CHANGEAGENTID ,@NOW ,@NOW FROM @SELECTEDADDRESSES.nodes('/SELECTEDADDRESSES/ITEM') T(c) END TRY BEGIN CATCH EXEC USP_RAISE_ERROR RETURN 1 END CATCH RETURN 0 END
